entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .net maui help #25591
  • App Unresponsive when prompting the user from a new page #25585
  • Maui Android deployment fails with error XABLD7023 #25583
  • Editor Scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25581
  • 8.0.82 to 8.0.90 causes slow down on iOS #25578
  • [Android] After Navigating back the screen shows half of previous and half of the page before the previous page #25571
  • [testing] Run Android device tests on Windows #25570
    .NET 9 SR1
  • no me sale las llaves en esta parte #25566

Closed

  • .NET MAUI SplashScreen PNG Resizing Incorrectly to Circular Shape #25500
  • [iOS] CollectionView will not scroll to the end of a horizontal list when ItemSpacing > 0 #14788
    .NET 9 SR1
  • [ci] Improve CI agents and pools #25491
    .NET 9 SR1
  • NRE when setting images on buttons with a null ImageSource on iOS in 8.0.92 #25409
    .NET 8 SR10
  • MSTEST project referring to a MAUI project sometimes fails to build #7806
    Backlog
  • 在Visual Studio上运行Android设备管理器中的仿真器时，出现报错，虚拟化各种服务均开启正常，请问应该怎么才能解决？ #25495
  • Embedded web view for blazor hybrid #25557
    Triaged
  • HapticFeedback for iOS crashes on iOS 17.4 since SR2 #25560
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Unable to add different resolution images for platform specific in .net MAUI while migration #23822

PullRequests

Created

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241029212245301 to net9.0 #25590
  • [main] Merge release 9.0.1xx to main #25589
  • [release/9.0.1xx] LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241029171919460 to net9.0 #25584
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241029171919460 to net9.0 #25579
  • [Android] RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand of CarouselView is not triggered #25574
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Testing] Written UI test for the issue resolved in PR 25453 #25573
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] More Appium actions #25569
    area-testing
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Bump Aspnet 8.0.10 #25586
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump ASPNet Versions #25587
  • Fix NRE on Clearing Tasks #25588
  • Fix missing SeedData #25582
  • Fix toast #25580
  • Template fixes #25577
  • [Windows] Improve AOT compatibility on Windows #25476
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [ci] Specify windows image #25568
    testing-infrastructure, testing-green-ci, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • [ci] Update versions sdk/runtime #25535
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • iOS UIImpactFeedbackGenerator should be used on iOS 17.5 and up #25561
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-essentials
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix toggle for including sample content in template #25564
  • Fix toggle for including sample content in template #25549
    t/bug, area-templates, .NET 9.0 GA

Updated

  • Nested Flex Layouts #25036
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, layout-flex
  • [Android] RefreshView in a grid #25413
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-refreshview
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • [Android] Reset ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY when ItemsSource changes #25362
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-listview
  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    do-not-merge, .NET 8 SR10
  • Make Style nullable #25230
    community ✨
  • [Android] Prevent the tap that closes an open SwipeView from being propagated to children #24275
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [net9.0][Enhancement][Android] Added Platform specific ripple color #23599
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Android] Page.IsBusy activity indicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23745
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fixed CarouselView Loop="False" rendering items incorrectly #25545
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [android] Fallback to default icons in SearchHandler #25067
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix [Android]Text Clipping Issue in Entry with Long Strings #25554
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Testing] Added UITests method overrides allowing the use queries #25559
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #2 #25378
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #25340
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Refactor ported Xamarin.UITest tests #25350
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fix for Frame PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #25239
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] CollectionView item sizing wrong after refresh #21736
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24142
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25374
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
